entries.journal_entry_description: One of the samples provided by Cryl's informant, Risyl, must be delivered to Zhadran. Find Zhadran near the Kerritamba village and deliver the sample.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: One of the samples provided by Cryl's informant, Risyl, must be delivered to Zhadran. Find Zhadran near the Kerritamba village and deliver the sample.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've given Zhadran the sample and should return to Cryl.
